mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (user_id, title, markdown_text, released_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{markdownText}, #{releasedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM article WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

select article.*, (select COUNT(*) from user_like_article ula where article.id = ula.article_id) like_count, user.account_name user_account_name from user_like_article, article INNER JOIN user ON article.user_id = user.id where article.released_at > DATE_SUB(now(), interval '7' DAY) order by like_count desc LIMIT 20;
SELECT *, user.account_name user_account_name FROM article, user WHERE title LIKE CONCAT(#{query}, '%')
